attributes.action: change the definition of "in the face of the enemy" to include bomb disposal work done by soldiers in combat zones so that this can be recognised by the award of a Victoria Cross
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a guerilla and insurgent conflict such as the one in Afghanistan most of the casualties are being caused by explosive devices. This petition therefore respectfully submits that this should be defined as being "in the face of the enemy" and therefore the Victoria Cross should be available as the ultimate recognition of supreme bravery in these circumtances.
